lead_paragraph: DAVIS--Edward. The staff and Board of PEN America are deeply saddened at the death of Edward Davis, a great champion of free expression and a generous and thoughtful adviser to PEN. Amid his vast global professional endeavors Ed was a dedicated pro bono attorney who represented us in exemplary fashion on vital free speech matters. His loyalty, passion and friendship will be deeply missed. Suzanne Nossel, Executive Director, PEN America 1/3
